attributes.action: REDUCTION OF ARMED FORCES PENSIONS ON REACHING STATE PENSION AGE
attributes.additional_details: Did you know that once you reach state pension age your armed forces pension is reduced.This is under the National Insurance Modification Rule.What exactly is this rule but service personnel should be made aware of this when leaving the services and drawing their pensions.But often are not.Why should you have your service pension reduced upon reaching 65 state pension age.Abolish this rule and let ex service men and women draw their pensions without any reduction to it when reaching 65
